title: Week In Politics: U.S.-Russia Ties, Slain NYPD Officers
teaser: Political commentators Ramesh Ponnuru and Gail Collins discuss state of U.S.- Russian relations, the two slain NYPD officers, and Senators Paul Rand and Marco Rubio clash over the U.S.-Cuba thaw.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
